body_html: I just post my work implementing convolution with sparse kernel. As I mentioned in the TODO list, there are still plenty of things need to improve, but overall performance is much faster than the dense convolution in TF, especially with a large size input. Please feel free to check it out and let me know if there is any issues. Thanks!

body: I just post my [work](https://github.com/Connor323/Convolution-with-sparse-kernel-in-TF) implementing convolution with sparse kernel. As I mentioned in the TODO list, there are still plenty of things need to improve, but overall performance is much faster than the dense convolution in TF, especially with a large size input. Please feel free to check it out and let me know if there is any issues. Thanks!
